name: Bracers of the Grizzly
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'grapple'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'strangle'.
The bearer of these bracers will inherit some of the strength of the grizzlies,
making all attempts of grappling and strangling more efficient.
